hooks.command:
# Prevent editing on main branch
[ "$(git branch --show-current)" != "main" ] || { echo '{"block": true, "message": "Cannot edit files on main branch. Create a feature branch first: git checkout -b your-name/feature-name"}' >&2; exit 2; }

# Type-check TypeScript files (non-blocking)
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|tsx)$ ]]; then
  output=$(cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && bunx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | head -20)
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -ne 0 ] && [ -n "$output" ]; then
    errors=$(echo "$output" | grep -E "error TS|Error:" | head -5)
    if [ -n "$errors" ]; then
      echo '<post-tool-use-hook>'
      echo 'TypeScript errors detected:'
      echo "$errors"
      echo '</post-tool-use-hook>'
    fi
  fi
fi
exit 0

# Lint changed files with Biome (non-blocking)
if [[ "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(ts|tsx|js|jsx|json)$ ]]; then
  output=$(cd "$CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR" && bunx biome check "$CLAUDE_TOOL_INPUT_FILE_PATH" 2>&1 | head -20)
  exit_code=$?
  if [ $exit_code -ne 0 ] && [ -n "$output" ]; then
    echo '<post-tool-use-hook>'
    echo 'Lint issues detected:'
    echo "$output"
    echo '</post-tool-use-hook>'
  fi
fi
exit 0
